subject: Don't forget to get mom flowers
body:
Don't forget to get mom flowers on MOTHER'S DAY which is on Sunday May 13th! 

The longer you wait the more money you'll have to pay, and if you wait too long then you may not be able to even get your mom flowers....and you don't want that to happen!

In fact, you should consider ordering your mom a special Mother's Day Bouquet from Grower Flowers! Grower Flowers is one of the ONLY professional flower services that LOWERS their prices on flower orders for Mother's Day! Most flower companies raise their prices, not Grower Flowers! 

Press here to get your mom a special Mother's Day Bouquet:

http://clovelight.com/t/qyycw9y7j/168567

Seriously, your MOM will love this special Mother's Day Bouquet, and you will most likely be her favorite child! 

Press here to save money on flowers for Mother's Day:

http://clovelight.com/t/qyycw9y7j/168567

------------------------------------------------------------
*Discounts will be deducted at check-out. *Prices are valid for on-line orders only; arrivals Tuesday through Friday only;  Saturday & Special delivery fees extra. *Prices are in US Dollars and do not include applicable shipping.*Prices and availability are subject to change.

If you wish to be removed from any future mailings click here : 

http://clovelight.com/t/qyycw9y7j/168568

Hi Subscriber! You are receiving this solicitation because producttestpanel@speedy.uwaterloo.ca previously agreed to receive correspondence from Copper Banana. If this service should fail to meet your expectations, feel free to disassociate yourself from our service.
